RelatedSentence: So far , the coastal fund has n't lost any money because of sneaky budget maneuvers .

The Geymann legislation is something that Louisiana 's delegation in the U.S. Congress needs as the members pursue more funding for the coastal projects needed throughout southern Louisiana .
